page.title: 08EDUCATION IN SALTCOATS
page.content:
There are two{Primary}schools {(Kyleshill}and{Argyle)}and one Special school{(Craigbank)}in Saltcoats. There are two{Primary}schools {(Ardeer}and{Glencairn)}in Stevenston. The only{Secondary}school in the map area is{Auchenharvie Academy}which has about 1000 pupils. In the last year, an extension of {Kilmarnock Tech.}has opened in the old Ardeer Primary school buildings.
There are four{nursery}schools and several{playgroups}attached to churches and community centres.
{ ICI}has its own{training centre}for their own apprentices and{YTS schemes.
